text: "Part-Time Lover" is a 1985 song by Stevie Wonder and is the leading single from his 20th studio album In Square Circle. It topped the single charts in Belgium, Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, Portugal, Spain and the United States and made the top 20 in Australia, Austria, Finland, France, Germany, the Netherlands, Norway, South Africa, Sweden, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. It received a Grammy nomination in 1986. == References == Category:1985 songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:Soul songs Category:Stevie Wonder songs
title: Part-Time Lover
